Posts.Content: I never had a PET scan, but had two Gallium scans, and the procedure is pretty similar. Like the others, having your arms in one place for such a long time is trying, and if you are claustrophobic that might make it harder. But definitely "doable"
Posts.Signature: My Story: http://cancerforums.net/viewtopic.php?t=11396 Diffuse Large B cell Lymphoma Stage 1AE (localized in colon) Began six cycles of R chop 21 3rd Dec 2008 Finished R chop 21 Apr 2009 Complete remission as of May 2009 Confirmed April 2010
Posts.Title: stage I breast cancer
